Title: Boss of the Bosk
Description:
There is one final thing I must ask of you.

There is a great monster that roams these woods. I am certain you've sensed it. It must be felled.

Rotbark was Freydrin's final means to control this basin, but even this was too great for any individual earthen. Ours is not to control, but to tend to its needs.

Use the staff once more and bring an end to Rotbark's reign.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Rotbark the Unfelled in Boskroot Basin.
PortraitGiverText: Rotbark was created to protect the land, then was left to fend for itself until it forgot itself and rotted. As was its maker.
CompletionText: If we are to restore this place, we must do so a different way. We must carve a new path.
RewardText:
Rotbark's demise will mark the ending of this basin's deterioration.

Thank you, $r. Your assistance has been most invaluable.
